attributes.action: Stop members of the Government and Parliament from attending WEF meetings
attributes.additional_details: We believe that Members of Parliament should not attend meetings of the World Economic Forum nor engage with its stated aims . The World Economic Forum is not the one who elects the government and it should have no influence over British politics or the Government.
attributes.background: We call on the Government to not allow any ministers or members of Parliament to engage with the World Economic Forum.
